text:
(cross-posted in <#C6E4SU1D3|plotting>) hi folks! i’m looking for a tool to build animated visualizations that are more general than the typical line/bar/scatter plots — does the community recommend a particular solution that
• works well in a notebook (ijulia is ok, pluto would be nice)
• provides animation, as well as static images
• nice to have: some interactivity support, file output to svg/gif
i’ve briefly looked at javis (they’re in the process of getting notebook support contributed) and makie (sounds like i’ll need to use the wglmakie back end, but somewhat struggling to get it to work with pluto)
